table.name: vtiger_ctuserfilterview
table.sql: CREATE TABLE `vtiger_ctuserfilterview` ( `ctuserfilterviewid` int(11) DEFAULT NULL, `ctuser_filter_view_no` varchar(255) DEFAULT NULL, `module_name` varchar(255) DEFAULT NULL, `filter_id` varchar(255) DEFAULT NULL, `filter_name` varchar(255) DEFAULT NULL ) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8

table.name: vtiger_ctuserfilterviewcf
table.sql: CREATE TABLE `vtiger_ctuserfilterviewcf` ( `ctuserfilterviewid` int(11) NOT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`ctuserfilterviewid`) ) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8

table.name: vtiger_cron_task
table.sql: INSERT INTO vtiger_cron_task( id, name, handler_file, frequency, laststart, lastend, STATUS , module, sequence, description ) SELECT MAX( id ) +1, 'CTLatLongScheduler', 'cron/modules/CTUserFilterView/AddRecordLatLong.service', '3600', '', '', '0', 'CTUserFilterView', MAX( sequence ) +1, 'Recommended frequency for Schedule CTLatLong is 1 Hour' FROM vtiger_cron_task
